blogPost.title: Vaccines will not see off covid-19 entirely. Governments must start thinking about how to live with the virus as an endemic disease. Our cover this week https://t.co/YWDcRHLq4c https://t.co/YGOL9RgyUn
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 疫苗不会完全消灭covid-19。各国政府必须开始考虑如何与该病毒作为一种地方性疾病共存。我们本周的封面https://t.co/YWDcRHLq4c https://t.co/YGOL9RgyUn
疫苗不會完全消滅covid-19。各國政府必須開始考慮如何與該病毒作爲一種地方性疾病共存。我們本週的封面https://t.co/YWDcRHLq4c https://t.co/YGOL9RgyUn

previous.title: Cannabis cafés, poker clubs, underground football matches and even outdoor sex are flourishing in Britain despite lockdown restrictions https://t.co/XkO80feK8v

localize.full_text: 大麻咖啡馆、扑克俱乐部、地下足球比赛甚至户外性爱在英国蓬勃发展，尽管有封锁限制，https://t.co/XkO80feK8v。
大麻咖啡館、撲克俱樂部、地下足球比賽甚至戶外性愛在英國蓬勃發展，儘管有封鎖限制，https://t.co/XkO80feK8v。

next.title: Imbalances in our bodies' microbial ecosystems are linked to an astonishing array of neurological and physical disorders including Parkinson’s disease, autism and diabetes. @kncukier talks to @gileadamit about the human microbiome on our "Babbage" podcast https://t.co/vmgE4mLA9t

localize.full_text: 我们身体的微生物生态系统的失衡与一系列神经和身体疾病有关，包括帕金森病，自闭症和糖尿病。@kncukier在我们的 "Babbage "播客中与@gileadamit谈论人类微生物组https://t.co/vmgE4mLA9t。
我們身體的微生物生態系統的失衡與一系列神經和身體疾病有關，包括帕金森病，自閉症和糖尿病。@kncukier在我們的 "Babbage "播客中與@gileadamit談論人類微生物組https://t.co/vmgE4mLA9t。
